alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 7:14PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Shelby and southeastern Jefferson Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 714 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southwestern Birmingham, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Birmingham, Hoover, Vestavia Hills, Homewood, Pelham, Mountain Brook, Helena, Chelsea, Indian Springs Village, Birmingham Fairgounds, B.j.c.c., Five Points South, Oak Mountain State Park, Ensley, Bluff Park, Legion Field, Oak Mountain Amphitheater, U.A.B. Campus, Samford University and Birmingham Southern College. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
